survey.title: PHILIP MORRIS CUSTOMER SURVEY
survey.instructions: PLEASE ANSWER EACH OF THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS IN TERMS OF YOUR MOST RECENT CONTACT WITH PHILIP MORRIS.

questions.question: Did you, in fact, recently write or telephone Philip Morris with a question or a problem?

options.instruction: We apologize for the error. Do not complete the questionnaire, but please return it so we can correct our records.

questions.question: Please read the list below and circle the reason(s) which prompted you to contact Philip Morris.

PACKAGING: Pack not properly sealed/came open at top or sides
Label was torn, twisted, skewed, or misapplied
CIGARETTES: Cigarette not completely filled with tobacco
Cigarette not properly sealed/came open at sides
PROMOTIONS: Received a letter indicating shipment would be delayed
Length of time to receive item
Item received was not item ordered/expected
MISCELLANEOUS: Request for general information on company

questions.question: Which ONE of the items you circled in Question 2 would you consider to be the MOST SERIOUS question or problem you contacted Philip Morris about?
questions.instruction: NUMBER CORRESPONDING TO MOST SERIOUS QUESTION/PROBLEM
